name: MicroSync
tag_list: website-design-australia, it-support-sydney, google-apps-reseller, it-company-sydney, it-support-services, network-support, google-apps-for-business, seo-australia, professional-seo-service
overview:
Microsync is an IT Company and Google Apps Reseller that provides website design, IT Support and Network support services within Sydney and across Australia.

MicroSync is your one-stop technology partner serving SME sized organisations based in Sydney. With over 15 years experience providing our pragmatic approach to IT, Technology and Web Solutions.

We specialise in

  • IT Support such as Emergency IT Support and Preventative Maintenance

  • IT Services such as Email, Cloud, Virtualization, Backup, Mobility, etc

  • IT Projects such as Email Migrations, Office Relocations, Online Backups, etc

  • IT Consulting such as Cloud Utilisation, Disaster Recovery Advice, etc

  • Application Software Development such as CRM, iPhone Apps, etc

  • Internet Marketing such as search engine optimisation, search marketing, etc

  • Internet, Hosting and Co-Location such as web hosting, private hosting, etc

  • Web Services such as CMS, Website Design, Web Optimisation, etc

  • Technology Services such as Video Conferencing, VOIP, Mobility, etc

Contact us for more information on how we can help you streamline your business.
